name: Assemblia
description: Builds highly customized AI automations to help government relations teams monitor, analyze and report on legislative activity. Our platform streamlines complex regulatory tracking across multiple jurisdictions, providing real-time alerts and comprehensive compliance reporting for organizations navigating the complex world of government affairs.

name: 4admin
description: Helps financial advisers scale using AI purpose-built for their complex back-office operations. Our intelligent automation platform handles compliance documentation, client onboarding, and regulatory reporting, allowing advisers to focus on what matters most - serving their clients and growing their practice.

name: CargoFax
description: Offers a web-based platform that democratizes trade data, providing actionable insights through visualizations. We help import/export businesses, freight forwarders, and trade analysts make data-driven decisions by transforming complex shipping and customs data into clear, actionable intelligence.

name: Datapeers
description: An AI revenue workforce for real estate companies. Our platform combines artificial intelligence with real estate expertise to automate lead qualification, property valuation, and customer relationship management, helping real estate professionals close more deals faster while reducing operational overhead.

name: HotHawk
description: An email client designed for how lead generation agencies run cold email for their clients. Built specifically for agencies managing multiple client campaigns, HotHawk provides advanced deliverability features, campaign analytics, and white-label reporting that helps agencies scale their cold email operations profitably.

name: Inbox Zero
description: Intelligent email assistant that automatically sorts messages and prepares tailored responses, cutting email time in half. Using advanced AI and natural language processing, Inbox Zero learns your communication patterns and priorities to help you achieve true email productivity and work-life balance.

name: LeadTruffle
description: Helps local businesses turn website visitors and missed calls into paying customers with 24/7 AI-powered text messaging. Our conversational AI platform engages prospects instantly, qualifies leads automatically, and schedules appointments seamlessly, ensuring no opportunity is ever missed.

name: OutboundLegal
description: Delivers consistent client acquisition for personal injury attorneys through automated, targeted marketing. Our platform combines legal industry expertise with advanced digital marketing automation to help law firms generate qualified leads while maintaining compliance with legal advertising regulations.

name: PPC Assist
description: Helps Amazon sellers increase profits and save time with automation and an AI assistant. Our comprehensive platform optimizes Amazon PPC campaigns, automates bid management, and provides intelligent insights to help sellers maximize their return on ad spend while scaling their Amazon business efficiently.

name: Rootabl
description: All-in-one affiliate platform designed for online course creators and community builders that automates tracking, payouts, and partner management. Rootabl simplifies affiliate marketing for digital educators, providing comprehensive analytics and seamless integration with popular course platforms.

name: Sombra
description: Provides financial firms a secure system to capture client conversations and generate compliant reports. Our platform ensures regulatory compliance while maintaining the highest security standards, helping financial advisors document client interactions and generate required compliance documentation automatically.

name: Spindle
description: Helps companies optimize complex operations with real-time, intelligent tracking of assets, people, and workflows. Our IoT-enabled platform provides comprehensive visibility into business operations, enabling data-driven decisions and operational efficiency improvements across manufacturing, logistics, and service industries.
location: Tampa, FL / Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Checkout Page
description: Transforming how businesses accept payments online with a flexible, no-code checkout page builder. Our platform enables businesses to create beautiful, conversion-optimized checkout experiences without technical expertise, supporting multiple payment methods and providing detailed analytics to maximize revenue.

name: easyreview
description: A powerful talent management platform that helps busy HR teams foster a more engaged, high-performing, and loyal workforce. Our comprehensive solution streamlines performance reviews, goal setting, and employee development, making talent management efficient and effective for growing companies.

name: Marllm
description: Helps businesses scale customized sales funnels using human-centric content AI co-workers. Our platform creates personalized sales experiences at scale by leveraging AI to understand customer behavior patterns and generate contextually relevant content that drives conversions.

name: OneAccord
description: A live AI translation platform for churches, bridging language gaps to make church services accessible to everyone. Our real-time translation technology enables multilingual congregations to worship together, supporting dozens of languages with accuracy and cultural sensitivity.

name: Remea
description: Provides a smart EV charging management platform tailored for businesses in the hospitality and SMB sectors. Our solution helps hotels, restaurants, and small businesses offer convenient EV charging to customers while optimizing energy costs and generating additional revenue streams.

name: Wrenly
description: An AI-powered tool in Slack/Teams for gathering feedback and offering actionable insights to leadership. Wrenly transforms workplace communication by automatically analyzing team sentiment, identifying potential issues early, and providing leaders with data-driven insights to improve team performance and satisfaction.

name: Vocala Smart Properties
description: Provides fleet-managed, Technology Enabled Care solutions that leverage Alexa devices to enhance senior living experiences. Our platform enables assisted living facilities and senior care providers to deliver personalized care, emergency response, and family connectivity through voice technology.

name: Reviewflowz
description: Helps SaaS companies optimize their visibility on software review platforms and collect, aggregate, manage, and showcase customer reviews and testimonials. Our platform automates review collection, monitors brand reputation across multiple platforms, and provides insights to improve customer satisfaction.

name: Sanoflow
description: An omnichannel conversational commerce platform that helps businesses to sell more on chat platforms like WhatsApp, Instagram, and more. Our AI-powered solution enables businesses to create seamless shopping experiences across messaging platforms, increasing conversion rates and customer engagement.

name: SquadCast
description: High-quality remote podcast recording platform that ensures crystal-clear audio for professional podcasters. SquadCast revolutionized remote podcast production by providing studio-quality recordings from anywhere in the world, enabling the creator economy boom in audio content.

name: Process Street
description: Workflow management software that helps teams create, track, and optimize recurring business processes. Process Street transforms chaotic workflows into systematic, repeatable processes that ensure consistency, compliance, and continuous improvement across organizations.

name: Userpilot
description: Product growth platform that helps SaaS companies increase user activation, feature adoption, and customer retention through personalized in-app experiences. Userpilot enables product teams to create guided tours, tooltips, and contextual messaging without requiring engineering resources.

name: Testimonial
description: Video testimonial collection platform that helps businesses gather authentic customer stories to boost conversions and build trust. Testimonial simplifies the process of collecting, managing, and showcasing customer testimonials across websites, marketing campaigns, and sales materials.

name: ChartMogul
description: Subscription analytics platform that helps SaaS businesses measure, understand, and grow their recurring revenue. ChartMogul provides comprehensive metrics and insights for subscription businesses, enabling data-driven decisions around customer acquisition, retention, and revenue optimization.

name: ReferralCandy
description: Referral marketing platform that helps e-commerce brands set up and automate customer referral programs. ReferralCandy transforms satisfied customers into brand advocates by making it easy to refer friends and family, driving organic growth through word-of-mouth marketing.

name: Feedback Fish
description: Simple and beautiful feedback widget for websites and web applications. Feedback Fish helps product teams collect user feedback effortlessly with customizable widgets that blend seamlessly into any website design, providing valuable insights for product improvement.

name: Postmark
description: Reliable email delivery service for web applications, focusing on transactional emails. Postmark ensures critical emails like password resets, order confirmations, and notifications reach customers' inboxes quickly and reliably, with detailed analytics and deliverability insights.

name: Close
description: CRM built for inside sales teams that combines email, calling, and lead management in one platform. Close helps sales teams have more conversations and close more deals by providing a unified workspace for all customer interactions, with powerful automation and analytics.

name: Bannerbear
description: API for auto-generating images, videos, and other media through templates and API calls. Bannerbear helps developers and marketers create personalized visual content at scale, perfect for social media automation, e-commerce product images, and dynamic marketing campaigns.
